replies.body: Please email support@avicus.net regarding issues you have with your ban, and give them your evidence. Only they can appeal your punishment. Please do not post ban appeals on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Please email support@avicus.net regarding issues you have with your ban, and give them your evidence. Only they can appeal your punishment. Please do not post ban appeals on the forums.
